website_summaries.verdict: Available in multiple patterns and colors, this fluffy and soft robe personifies luxury and comfort on a chilly day.
pros: Zipper closure rather than a tie is easier to keep closed, especially for extended wear
Long length is convenient for added warmth
Robe features 2 deep pockets, which are perfect for warming hands and holding items like cell phone
cons: This robe runs large, buyers may want to consider sizing down

customer_reviews.title: Lint disaster
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. Looked great in the package, put it in the wash, dryer, then bam, instant regret. There was lint from it all over. I was embarrassed I bought it for her. Too much for a lint roller so I spent about 20 minutes picking the lint off by hand. It was still shedding lint all over everything. Washed it again. Same thing, but a little bit less lint. After the second wash/hand lint picking I decided to take a picture of all the lint I picked off, as you can see, it was quite a bit. My wife says it is warm and comfortable, however I won't be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: don

customer_reviews.title: 10 minutes to get zipper down
customer_reviews.text: Took 10 minutes and PLIERS to get the zipper at the top pulled down! The material at the top was interfering with the zipper, very poor design. After getting the zipper down wife said it fits as expected, and will keep it as long as she doesn't pull the zipper all the way up to the collar.
customer_reviews.author: EJB59

customer_reviews.title: It fits 2 sizes larger than thaw BS chart suggests.
customer_reviews.text: This is a SMALL!!! I am 5’10 175# 40” chest 42” hips and this fits me with “so much room for activities!”LOL The chest would easily fit 50” chest! I ordered small due to the other reviews and because it was the only size besides XXXL in this color. So glad I ordered a small!!! It fits so nicely for a lounger. I ALWAYS wear L-XL in female sizes depending on designer. This fits like Large if not XL! This photo is the rob zipped laying on a full size bed for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Gigantic but cozy!
customer_reviews.text: Love my fleece robe, but it is gigantic! I don't mind because I just want to stay cozy and warm, but it fits like a blanket with a zipper! I got the small and I usually wear a large...
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Raney

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully cozy!
customer_reviews.text: This robe is the softest, and most fluffy, I've ever bought or had given to me. I do find the size runs larger (about one full size) and longer than I expected. Standing only 5' 5" it covers my ankles. But that's wonderful for curling up on the sofa. In that position being oversized means it covers my feet too. The fabric is the identical fluffiness inside and out. Feels totally luxurious! AND it is very well made!!
customer_reviews.author: JMRushing

customer_reviews.title: Love it....but lots wrong with it
customer_reviews.text: Great fabric, as soft as a poly baby blanket and, pre-wash, the fabric is thick. Great length as it comes just above my ankles and I'm 5'8, so am very pleased. Size runs *huge* so order 2 sizes down. Zipper? Tried to put it on for the first time and It's stuck and won't budge. Robe is going back. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie A.

customer_reviews.title: Luscious and big
customer_reviews.text: What a gorgeous robe and yummy feeling! Of course, I love purple and this a beautiful purple! Just got it today and even though I never look forward to winter.............I'll definitely be toasty in this. SIZING: I usually wear a Large, but ordered this in the Small/Medium per the reviews..........well I think it's much bigger than a large. If it had come in XS, I would return for that size - since it doesn't come smaller I'm keeping this one! It's hard to find robes that zip and especially ones this nice .........so use caution when ordering - definitely go down a size or so.
customer_reviews.author: Della Terra

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for over a week and I loved it!! Until I put it on this morning and on pocket has a hole at the seam and the other pocket has unraveled at the seam!!! I paid $60 for a robe that falls apart in a week!! I am very upset!!
customer_reviews.author: Julez

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get what I ordered, twice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered twice and didn't get what I ordered. I ordered a gray zip-up robe and received a black/white tie robe with a hood. Good thing my daughter wanted it. I gave it to her. I ordered again because I love how soft it is and thought maybe someone just messed up but once again I received the exact same robe. On the package of the robe it says that it is a gray zip-up robe. The packaging is wrong. I gave this robe to my other daughter. They both loved them but I will not order again. The robe is soft and of wonderful quality but just isn't what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs way too big, sizing is off.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to write a review to help others with the sizing. I usually wear size 16 or 1x, so I ordered a l/xl It was humongous like the size of a 3x, or double the size I normally wear. I feel the sizing is way off. The material seemed to be a nice quality, but was way too thick for what I wanted. I was thinking to exchange it for a smaller size, but decided to return it, because it was so heavy. I was looking for something cozy to wear around the house, that was thinner.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Warm Robe
customer_reviews.text: I give this robe a 3 on review because of the fit. I normally wear a 1X. I read many of the reviews so I decided to order the XL and it was to big. I was going to send it back, but first I ordered the next size down the Small/Medium and it was to small. I decided to keep the XL because I need a robe and it's difficult to find a zip up robe in the stores. They need a size Medium/Large, but that's not available. The positive side of this robe is it's warm for the winter time we have here in GA. Just be cautious when you order the size.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this robe/house coat! I got it because a male relative moved in with me and I wanted to have a little modesty without having to sacrifice comfort (i.e. I’ll be damned if I’m going to wear a bra at home!). It’s perfect! It’s like being wrapped in a cozy blanket. I just wish I didn’t have to take it off to go to work every day. I note about sizing, in case it’s helpful to anyone: I’m 5’8”, 250 lbs, and normally wear a size 20/22 pants. I bought a size L/XL because I read that they run big. It fit perfectly. However, I wanted something that was baggy, so I exchanged it for a size 1XL/2XL.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Unacceptable
customer_reviews.text: It is so difficult to find a robe with the right material, pockets, design and comfort that has a full zipper. No where in the description did it say the zipper opens from the top and bottom. This would have been a deal breaker if I knew before I ordered. I was unable to easily unzip and rezip without a problem due to the two way zipper. Sadly, I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: DLM

customer_reviews.title: Really beautiful and comfortable robe, not too large!!
customer_reviews.text: Soft cozy and warm. Read all the reviews, and ordered small/medium. Fits great. I am a size 10-12 and roll up the sleeves once when doing dishes. Am short 5 feet 3 and length almost to the floor but not tripping. Keeps my feet warm too. Check the dates when reading the reviews as this fits very well and maybe the company adjusted it some. The zipper works very well too.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda V. Havemeyer

customer_reviews.title: Fuzz balls everywhere
customer_reviews.text: The Good: Love the fit and the softness. I got the pale blue with white dots, it was pretty. The zipper worked fine. The Cons: Before wearing, I washed and dried per instructions. Now, I expected some fuzz balls in the dryer lint trap the first time drying. But there were fuzz balls all over the robe and if you got it against you, you were wearing fuzz balls. OK, I immediately put it through another wash and dry cycle. Same thing, only worse. Packed it up and am sending it back. I have similar robes by other brands and did not have this problem. Really wanted to love this robe!
customer_reviews.author: Sue R.

customer_reviews.title: Soft but extremely oversized!
customer_reviews.text: I got the Large/Xlarge and prefer a loose robe (wear an 8-10), but this robe is HUGE. I am broad shouldered, yet the shoulders are way too big. I can also pull out about a foot of extra fabric on both sides, yet it still isn't quite long enough for 5'7". I would prefer a few more inches so it reached my ankles. The pluses are the fabric is wonderfully soft and it is a pretty red color hard to find. Usually rose is passed off for red these days. The fit leaves a lot to be desired for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: MsResearchQueen

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy!!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I ordered one size smaller -- a mistake. It wasn't that I couldn't wear it -it is just that I like my robes loose and this one was snug around the hips. But the VOLUME of fabric!!!!!! I think because the fabric is so thick that it seemed voluminous and heavy when I unwrapped it. The colour was beautiful the fabric very soft, but as I said - very thick. The biggest problem I had however was when I pulled it over my head - I started coughing and couldn't stop!! Perhaps whatever was irritating might wash out but I won't know because unfortunately I won't be keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective Zipper
customer_reviews.text: So very disappointed...literally the 2nd night I wore this robe the zipper broke! It kept getting stuck & was difficult to operate the 1st night, but I managed & thought OK, just be careful. Well, that didn't matter. And because I was out of town for 10 days & behind on things around the house, I hadn't even opened the box it came in until too late... I missed the deadline to return it by 2 hrs!! Total waste of $60!! FYI: It is as exactly as everyone has described...a soft, heavy, warm blanket & I would have loved it if only it had a functioning zipper!
customer_reviews.author: Trump2020!!!

customer_reviews.title: WARNING WASHING FOLLOW DIRECTIONS AND HORRIBLE MESS RUINED OTHER CLOTHES
customer_reviews.text: I WANT ANOTHER ROBE THIS IS SAD IT RUINED A LARGE LOAD OF CLOTHERS =PILLERS EVERYWHERE STICKER ROLLER DOES NOT WORK TO GET THIS MESS. I HAD OVER 150.00 CLOTHES RUINED!! EXTREMELY MAD! I FOLLOWED DIRECTIONS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! PISSED OFF JENNIFER CHAPMAN-CRUZ
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Size down!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. It's warm and cozy. But way too big. I'm 5 foot 3 and a half, about 140 lb. Length reaches all the way to my feet which I wanted. However, I'm just swimming in it. I am a good seamstress, and I'm going to tailor it to fit my body a bit better. I probably need to take in 5 inch or so with seams down the back. and I am also going to shorten the sleeves because they're just too long for me. It's worth it to make the changes for me at least, because I've been looking for something like this for a long time. Material is good and well-constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Obermaier

customer_reviews.title: One of the nicest bathrobes I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This bathrobe has a boxy fit, as advertised. The fleece is luxurious; very thick, warm and soft. I love, love, love that it has a two-way zipper, for freedom of movement, but the zipper is a little hard to line up and start. Once started, it works fine. The plaid is as pictured. A few hanging threads needed to be clipped off, but I almost expect that. It is a very toasty garment to wear when keeping the thermostat lowered. I wear it before dressing for work, and lounge in it after work. In a long life, it is one of the 2 best bathrobes I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous robe
customer_reviews.text: This robe is awesome! It runs big.. but when you sit down it it, it is perfect... kind of like a blanket affect. I love the green color. The weight is perfect, warm and cuddly! The sleeves are a bit long but the robe is perfect length. I am 5'1" and it does Not drag the ground. It sheds a little, but not bad. Overall, so thrilled I purchased this fabulous robe! Small/medium size
customer_reviews.author: sugarcandi

customer_reviews.title: LISTEN TO YOUR FEEDBACK DEL ROSSA!!
customer_reviews.text: Just ridiculous that a company with such a GREAT product can't get it's act together regarding sizing!!!! I am a true size ten and the small/ medium is like an XL!!! Even bigger.....and there is NO SMALLER option??? CRAZY!!!!! The sleeves hang 6" over my hands and the body is huge...and I am not petite, trust me! Not cheap either
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: runs large/very long
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel and weight of fabric. Nice and warm. Color wonderful. Runs on the large size. I am a size 16. I first ordered a Lg/XLg after looking at the measurement chart. Sent back and wanted to get a M, but that size wasn't available so I ordered a S/M. It fit good except the length seems very long I'm 5'4". I need to pick it up going upstairs. Constantly stepping on it. Also the bottom is narrow (straight down from underarm). I feel like I'm walking like Morticia from the Adams Family series. I need to unzip from the bottom when sitting. Just would have liked it to flair out a little on the lower end.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Richter

customer_reviews.title: Bathrobe zipper already broken.
customer_reviews.text: I searched and searched for a bathrobe that zipped-I hate the way wrap ones with a belt come loose. Color-I wanted a mixture of colors so a spot wouldn't show-this one is pink and purple, lovely. Long, to the floor-perfect. The feel of the material is that really snuggly blanket fabric. All of this is even more than a 5 star. There are two handles for the zipper, from the top and from the bottom. The one at the bottom is already broken! We have had such a small amount of cold weather so far, it hasn't even been worn enough to wash. Horribly disappointed. Susan Lauer
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lauer

customer_reviews.title: Twice as big as expected
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully warm and comfy but it's huge! Other reviews said this runs large so I ordered Large/XL instead of my usual 1X but I probably should've ordered Small. I'm short so expected to need to shorten the length and turn up the sleeves but it's also extra wide. I'm thinking of giving it to a taller friend and ordering one in small. Seems well made except that one pocket is coming unstitched at the top. I appreciate the inside loop at the top making it easy to hang on a hook.
customer_reviews.author: Northwest Joy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect except for sizing
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews about the sizing and ordered the L/XL. I am 5'9" and 219 lbs. I normally wear 2X. I should have ordered another size down, because this is still HUGE. But I am not going to return it because I just use it to go to and from the spa outside. It is very thick, so if you are cold blooded this is the robe for you. If you are normally wearing a XS, S, M this is not the robe for you. The red is a nice "Bing Cherry" color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sheds terriblely
customer_reviews.text: So now after the third washing this robe has shed so bad that it's basically unusable. It ruined a whole dryer full of clothes by shedding so bad that it's stuck to every other piece of clothing and I spent hours trying to pick all the little pieces off l that stuck to all the other clothing and still can't get them off. It basically can't be use now after 3 washes and it was very expensive robe.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Ustica

customer_reviews.title: Maybe mislabeled?
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this robe! It is soft, cozy and warm! Only problem is I ordered a size small since I’m a size 6. It’s SO LARGE that I literally could put two of me inside! That’s why I think it must have been mislabeled. I understand a little room for flexibility but this is HUGE! Why didn’t I send it back? Because I love the robe!! Other than it doesn’t fit. 😄. Better too large than too small. If you’re one to get cold, this is definitely going to keep you warm plus it isn’t overly heavy. Sooo soft! Does shed for awhile but that stops. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Jean

customer_reviews.title: Huge & No Defined Shape at All
customer_reviews.text: This robe runs insanely large & the armholes were almost to my waist. Sleeves were way long and so wide I can't imagine being able to roll them up and have them stay rolled up. Too bad as color was just as shown & the fabric felt great! I was almost going to keep it & have it altered, but that would have cost just less than the robe itself, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhoda Cataleta

customer_reviews.title: Well made, soft and warm - just love it!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this bathrobe! I’ve been looking for one to replace my old one that I loved. So warm, soft and comfortable. Very well made. My only concern is that it runs way too large. I usually wear an XL but after reading a lot of reviews I purchased a S-M and it fits perfectly. I’d like to recommend it to my sister and daughter but they are a lot smaller than me so couldn’t wear your smallest size. You are leaving out a lot of potential customers. This is the nicest bathrobe I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: ENORMOUS
customer_reviews.text: This robe seemed promising in the reviews, but I did question the sizing. I am full figured in the bust and decided to go for the L/XL. Well I could have gotten two more girls in with me. So sorry I had not read all the reviews until after I ordered the robe.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Toasty
customer_reviews.text: Very cozy, high quality thick fleece. Designed to wear when it's cold; you can keep the temp down in your house. It's a feminine pink and dark blue plaid, full zipper that stands a licking and easy to get in and out of. I usually wear a large but the small/ medium is just right. Not a light weight robe but, as I said, very cozy. Very good value for the money. Warm and toasty.
customer_reviews.author: Grafton Wisconsin reader

customer_reviews.title: #1 best daughter scores!
customer_reviews.text: Score for daughter!!! Thanks Amazon, it’s great to be able to send my momma something to cheer her up when she is feeling down with the yucky weather. The color is beautiful and bright, I think the zipper makes it easier for her to get in and out of it. The Queen mother’s words are I love the color, it feels amazing, she doesn’t agree with me about the zipper, and it does run big so I would have definitely gone down in size. But all in all she is happy and I love seeing her smile with the bright color on her. #1 daughter scores again! Love my momma so much!!! Alyson Robichaux
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and warm!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great robe, I love it! The plaid colors are exactly as pictured and there's plenty of room. I like my robes really large and usually buy a 1X, but after reading many reviews, I followed their advice that it runs really large and to order a smaller size. I got XL and it is plenty big enough. I'm 5'6" and I like the sleeve length and that the length is down to my ankles. It's wonderful, warm and comfortable, I finally found the perfect robe for winter!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: It does run large
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say I'm not fond of fleece. I like Chenille but it sheds. I just stopped wearing my favorite Chenille robe that I've had for 3 years because I couldn't stand the shedding any more. I ordered the fleece robe and I am happy with it as I could be. I sewed the opening shot at the bottom because I like a robe that is sewn all the way down. I tacked the collar down because I didn't notice that it was one that zipped all the way up. Now all that being said I like the robe okay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy, runs really big
customer_reviews.text: Runs really big, I'm 5ft 2 in, weight is 185, heeding the comments, I ordered a sm/ med, a little snug on my arms, I have small arms, hip wise, it fit comfortably, just a tad snug. I gave three stars, because it's so heavy, I'm taking it off,after maybe 10 minutes, I rarely wear it, but it makes a good throw blanket, for my legs. I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Essential for the Dark Covid winter
customer_reviews.text: I’m firmly an 18/20 in all the major plus sized brands and purchased the L/XL sized zip up robe. The shoulders are a little wide, making the sleeves also a smidge too long. But I like the ample room in the tush. It would fit me better if it was more a-line rather than boxy. That said? It is thick and plush and weighs nothing. The inside is just as soft as the outside. The pockets are perfect for my phone. I am super excited to add this to my hygge repertoire for the Covid 2020 Winter.
customer_reviews.author: UpstateAbs

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: This robe is soft, warm, cozy and comfy. Luv the zip-up. Unlike belt-tie robes, this stays fastened. ILuv it and would highly recommend. I do agree with other reviews that it runs on the large side. I wear a size 12 and like my loungewear to be very roomy. I generally order size large. But I listened to other reviewers and ordered the small/medium. It fits perfectly-lots of room.
customer_reviews.author: Ryfnewjersey

customer_reviews.title: Best robe ever.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this robe! The fleece is so soft and cozy. I never really thought about pocket style before but I already like these patch pockets MUCH better than the side seam ones on my old robe. I ordered the pink and purple plaid and it’s just as pretty as shown in the pictures. As others have said, I’m VERY glad I read the previous reviews regarding sizing. I am usually a 1-2x but based on others advice, I ordered the L/XL and it is perfect. I’m so happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: L. Howard

customer_reviews.title: 10 out of 10 - a Real Winner
customer_reviews.text: Got the Large XL - Somewhat roomy but I don't want a smaller size - will have the sleeves taken in and under the arms - rare for me as I'm generous on top, bottom of gown also loose but comfy for lounging - somehow, soft fleecy robes should not be, for me, form fitting but a little looser and comfy to stretch out or snuggle up. It really seem well made - good zipper, easy on and off, soft as bunny fur - have only tried on but will wear when washed, in cold and hang to dry- but other reviews seem to indicate no shrinkage so all in all, 10 out of 10.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this robe. It is so soft, plush and WARM! Great quality and price. Bought one for my sister in Indiana and she loved it. The first robe I bought was a little bigger than I expected so I gave it to my husband and bought a smaller one for myself. The minute I get home from a 12 hour shift at the hospital, I am in it! Liked my purple one so much bought it again in black. Features roomy sleeves, deep pockets and the double zipper is nice.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Alexander Del Rossa Women's Robe
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful robe. Soft, warm and a lovely color. As far as sizing goes, I would have to disagree with others who say it is too big. I like my robes to be loose and flowing, so pjs and leggings worn at night don't make it feel too tight. I went with what others had said and ordered the L/1X, instead of my first inclination to go up a size. I wish I had ordered up one size. It does fit, but there isn't a great deal of room once zipped up. If you like your robes looser, take that into consideration---it all depends on how you like your clothes to fit.
customer_reviews.author: painter

customer_reviews.title: warm with 2 cut options
customer_reviews.text: My only gripe about this robe is the length. It is super soft, light weight, nice and warm plus it has pockets. I just wish it were longer. I am 5'7" and it hits me mid calf. It is loose fitting so will go over my bulkier pajamas in winter. I am always cold so this is nice as I can layer. There are 2 different cuts so pay attention. If you want a closer fit choose the other. Its more colum style. This one is more A line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this ROBE! See updated comments.
customer_reviews.text: This robe is warm, soft, fuzzy and everything I anti icipated and I'm a robe snob. Love it.... Update: zipper has been difficult to use and after one washing I now have fuzz on everything BEWARE. Still love how soft and warm it is but they need to not use a 2-way zipper when it comes up from the bottom while sitting the ends stab your leg. Makes it come tougher uneven so when removing the zipper doesn’t want to come apart easily.
customer_reviews.author: Moonyean C. LeFevre

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but too large!
customer_reviews.text: The robe is thick and luxuriously soft and the color is exactly as displayed on screen, but it is much too large. I selected the smallest size, the Small/Medium, because I read the other reviews about the sizing. I bought it as a Christmas gift for my size medium mother-in-law. She is tall, so the extra length is great, but the width is what I would expect in a size large or even extra-large. My fingers are crossed that she won't mind the extra room, but I'm keeping the packaging in case it needs to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Lee Carlyon

customer_reviews.title: Best robe ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best robe I've had in years and ordered yet another. Although it runs a size large, even more, that can be compensated for by ordering a size smaller.it is toasty warm, colorful and soft. The zipper is a ruggard two way zipper so can be unzipped from bottom or top: a nice feature when dressing in a cold room. Unzip bottom, put pants on, then top. Pockets are on front and are very easily accessible. Can't recommend this more highl
customer_reviews.author: net shopper

customer_reviews.title: Warm and fuzzy
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing like this robe. It's warm and cozy. The zipper works fine. I saw some reviews saying otherwise. I can't imagine how they had problems. I'm almost 6' and the robe is long enough for me. It's so warm I can walk my furkids in it and it keeps me warm. I'm in Arizona we only get down to maybe 28F or so. I would recommend this to my friends and family. It's not too heavy, I can't imagine how it is so warm.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Clark and Ron Newman

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and fit !
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves her robe. She looked all over town until one day she said!! I’m so frustrated! I simply can’t believe I can’t find a robe!! I said sit with me and let’s look on Amazon. We’ll find! She agreed. Within 10 mins we found and purchased the robe. It arrived in two days and Was perfect!!! She’s very happy. Plans to buy another soon. Thanks Richard and Konna Adams
customer_reviews.author: richard r adams

customer_reviews.title: The most cozy robe ever!
customer_reviews.text: It is winter and when we run our heat, it gets super hot upstairs and stays chillier downstairs. In an attempt to not cook my family members upstairs, I ordered this robe to keep cozy downstairs. It is so soft and comfortable. Roomy. It has a zipper up the front instead of a fat tie/belt. I find that it runs roomy, so I just wrap up in it like a personal blankie and don't use the zipper. It's a cozy, heavenly cloud of warmth without getting too hot. I love it. :-)
customer_reviews.author: FireflyJones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit + warm & cozy = happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5' 6" and weigh 165 lbs, and the large fits me beautifully! There are so many things I love about this bathrobe. Most notably, it's incredibly warm, cozy, and reaches my ankles and the sleeves are not too short or too long. (It's the first time I can remember wearing a robe that reached my ankles!) I really like the two pockets on the front, and that the robe can be zipped from the bottom or top. Because I like this product so much, I bought other products from the same designer and have not been disappointed in any of them!
customer_reviews.author: Spring S

customer_reviews.title: a double winner at 5' 4" and 135#
customer_reviews.text: this is my 2nd robe from this company! the 1st black one I got in 2017 is huge and still functioning well for me. this is truly a blanket robe :) just the way I love them. I purchased the lg/xtra lg and I simply swim in it and it skims the floor. the breakaway zipper still works in the original robe after use almost everyday. the color of this one is lovely and subtle and maybe a bit lighter in weight but works beautifully because its so large. ladies...its a keeper. soft soft soft. good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: positive girl

customer_reviews.title: Love this robe!
customer_reviews.text: I love this robe! It runs quite large, but since I expected that and went down 2 sizes, I'm very happy with the fit. Just the right length, it hits right above my ankles and the sleeves are a good length. I do need to turn up the sleeve hems if I'm doing anything in the kitchen, but that is expected and I prefer to have the length when it is cold. The fabric is fantastic - very plush, soft and warm. I've come to appreciate the patch pockets because my keys and phone don't end up in the sofa cushions after a late-night movie. If you go down a couple of sizes you will love this robe!
customer_reviews.author: Texas

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this robe when I received it. I washed it separately per instructions before wearing and then began wearing it. It shed on everything so I washed it again with some other clothes and when it came out of the dryer, the robe along with everything else was covered in fur balls. I don't think I will be able to get it off the other clothes. I am totally pissed. I would not even pass this on to someone else to wear. It is going in the trash!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY WARM AND SOFT!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely warm, even in my freezing Michigan temperatures! I will only be able to wear this during the coldest of temps, but it's good to have one for those days of freezing temps. I like to keep my thermostat down in the low 60s in the daytime to conserve energy costs. The workmanship could be better, though. One of my pockets was sewn in slightly askew instead of straight. That was very disappointing; but it's only me here, so I'm not going to worry about it.
customer_reviews.author: Bethay

customer_reviews.title: Order a size smaller than you would normally wear in a robe!
customer_reviews.text: Love love this House robe! So so soft! I took the advice of other reviews saying to order a smaller size than normal because the fit was on the Larger side. I usually wear an xL and ordered a S/M and as you can see it’s still roomy but I love the fit! A really great robe
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Beyond plush. Absolutely beautiful. Looks even better in person.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Super plush like the super soft blankets in the store. The picture does not do it justice. Beautiful! It not only feels extra soft it looks it. Makes you want to touch it. You won't be sorry with this robe.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great robe but runs SUPER BIG!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy, super warm, super well made, SUPER BIG!! I am 5'3", size 12/14 so I thought I would go with the large/x-large so I would have a nice robe to snuggle in. Wow, not only can I snuggle in the robe, so can't the hubs, the dog and 27 hamsters!! A plus is the two way zipper, I didn't recall reading that in the product description. I kept the robe because it is super comfy and warm, I just have to wrap it around myself if I want to be snuggled into it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine87120

customer_reviews.title: jedi master robe
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Zipper broke after a month. Product not very useful without zipper. I am 5'8" and 140ish lbs. And the large is generous, but I wouldn't say overly huge. I purchased the grey, and like to zip it all the way up. ...my husband calls me his little jedi master! Pockets are large, and if I had space for 2, I'd buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Bar fly now Mama

customer_reviews.title: Yes, size down.
customer_reviews.text: Runs very large. Do listen to the warnings in the reviews, and go down a size. In addition, when washing in a machine, the robe absorbs so much water that it becomes extremely heavy. This can lead to uneven distribution of the load of wet laundry, causing loud thumping as the washer spins. Make sure to monitor the washer during the cycles. Aside from the cautions above, the robe is very warm and soft. I can only wear it when it is wintry cold, or I overheat. Great winter robe!
customer_reviews.author: sage

customer_reviews.title: You will want to live in it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most glorious robe ever created! I use it for a blanket because I can't tear myself away from it (I may be buried in it!) I was concerned that it might be that cheap type of material that is thin and falls apart but this is something you can run your fingers through and pet! I have named it~~it is that wonderful. I call it Meece (my son insists that is the plural for Moose) :)
customer_reviews.author: oRgaNicTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: I am in Love with this robe!
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews and it does run large so I ordered down and it fits perfectly. I was looking for a robe that would be warm and, believe me, this one is it! Love how the neck line is high to keep your neck warm. When you get up and its chilly...putting this on is like a big warm hug! Trying to decide on another color since I will be ordering another!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bathrobe!!
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered before reading all of the reviews (I tend to jump the gun) and was a little nervous that I had bought something that would be too large based on a lot of the reviews, but I had to just wait until it arrived. I'm so glad I ordered the L/XL. I fits great, big like a mumu should and at 179 lbs and 5'6", I have plenty of room to move around with excellent coverage all the way to the ankles. I love this bathrobe!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael O.

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to comments on sizing.  This runs huge!!!
customer_reviews.text: Warm and soft. Thought purple was more of a plum color but seems more like royal purple. I normally wear an XXL to 1X. Because of comments on size, I ordered a L-XL. I am 5'10 and 200 lbs and this is huge all around. Shoulder seams hang at least 6 inches below where they should be and I think 2 of me could fit in robe. I am not returning it because too much bother and if a robe is big, so what! DOuble zipper can be a little tricky
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: I love this robe!
customer_reviews.text: I love this robe! I told my husband I would love to have a nice roomy robe that zips. He bought this for my birthday and it’s amazing. I love wearing it. It’s warm, it’s roomy and comfy, and - for me- the proportions (arm length, overall length) work well. I’m 5,5” size 14/16 and this L/XL size is very roomy but I love that. I probably could have gone a size down if I wanted it more fitted. I have had it a couple months now and use it consistently. So far, I am very happy with it and would buy it again without hesitation. Quality is nice and the color is just gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to open the plastic bag this robe came in because the color is a beautiful purple! That’s where my excitement ended! When I opened the bag the robe had a terrible odor. I immediately threw it in the washer. When I was able to try it on the disappointment continued. I’m 5’2” and weigh 135 lbs. Not only is the small/medium super large on me, the 2 way zipper sticks really bad too! I would definitely be returning this robe if I hadn’t washed it before I could even try it on.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Turowski

customer_reviews.title: Best Robe on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best robe on the planet! It’s so warm and cozy! This is the third robe I’ve purchased from this company. I absolutely adore these robes! They’re super-soft and extremely warm. I love that they have deep pockets, too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Problem with sizing and zipper
customer_reviews.text: I'm a small woman and wanted a small. There were 2 sizes only to pick from... S/M and M/L. The robe is very large on me...I really need a SMALL...not S/M. AND...the zipper didn't zip past 2 inches. I had to clip some threads and trim some fabric to release the zipper before I could try it on. Not impressed much. I bought it for the style and color. I considered seriously returning it but didn't want the bother. It is warm and I live in Oregon. Why can't this robe come in standard sizes SMALL, MEDIUM AND LARGE? 3 STARS.
customer_reviews.author: Bob scott

customer_reviews.title: Runs very large
customer_reviews.text: Very hesitant to order after reading about sizing. I went ahead and ordered the sm/med not believing that it would be the right size as I normally order med/lge. Well, it is huge but so plush and warm I decided to keep it as I don't think it comes in a smaller size. I am 5'4 and it comes to my ankles which I like. Really need to trust that when people write review stating something runs large, it really does.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great robe. It is warm, the color is beautiful and is exactly what I was looking for. I do believe it runs a bit small. I am 5'2 and weigh 113 lbs and I bought the Large. I wanted something oversized with room. This robe hit the bottom of my ankles and the sleeves the tips of my fingers. It is roomy, which is exactly what I wanted, but fits more like a Medium than a Large. I would recommend this product, but I would size up for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Buy small, but definitely buy!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before purchasing this robe. I am a size 16, but ordered a small/medium upon the advice of other reviewers. I was regretting that decision while I waited for it to arrive, but to my surprise, the smaller size fit perfectly! I love the robe! It is soft and just heavy enough to feel cozy. One of my favorite features is the double zipper. The whole reason I needed a new robe was because my previous robe tore on the bottom from getting twisted when lounging. Being able to unzip from the bottom up or top down give me the freedom to get comfy on the couch without worrying about tearing the fabric when it tangles.
customer_reviews.author: Karen G.

customer_reviews.title: Very snugly and warm
customer_reviews.text: The robe is very comfy and warm, but definitely runs big. I bought a sm/med and it fits like an extra large, and I am 5'8", 160 lbs.. It is very heavy or thick fleece so it is very warm. The only thing I didn't like, other than it being so large, is the top of the zipper stabs you under the chin/neck. They should have stopped the zipper about an inch below the neck line instead of bringing it all the way to the very edge of the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft and Plush, I love wearing this Robe.
customer_reviews.text: This runs Big ! I sized down as advised by the reviews and it is still big, but for me that is ok in a robe. I love wearing it. Very soft and plush. Beautiful vibrant colors. Ok to go out to get the mail or morning papers😉
customer_reviews.author: jan c.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Lounging
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and cozy. Love the deep pockets. I bought a large. I wear an 8 but I like a little more room when lounging. I'm a 5'2 @ 154lb curvy frame. The purple color looks just the website. Well made. I'm very happy with this robe.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me for Christmas and it is too late to return. It is beyond huge. I am 5’6” but the pockets are on my thighs. The sleeves need to be rolled twice. As for width, at least two of me could fit inside. Incredible how huge this is.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Pat

customer_reviews.title: What a joy on cold mornings!
customer_reviews.text: finally! A dressing gown for Canadian winters! This is thick and comfortable and cozy, with a strong zipper that's easy to start and much better as a closure to a robe than just tying it around my waist or buttoning it (and having the buttons pop as I sit down, esp. around the knees. This robe is longish, so it keeps my ankles warm, too, but it causes no troubles when I want to walk. For the price, this is a real bargain..
customer_reviews.author: cronemagic

customer_reviews.title: Very Heavy Weight
customer_reviews.text: Way too heavyweight and hot for my tastes but if you're looking for that this would be a good robe. Also the arms seemed really long but you could probably hem them.
customer_reviews.author: mini

customer_reviews.title: Pay close attention to reviews/sizing!  It runs large!
customer_reviews.text: Love this zipper front robe. I read reviews. I am 5’2”, 170 lbs. Based on reviews I ordered small/medium and it’s fits perfectly! Just clears the floor above my feet. So so soft! I would usually order large, but paid attention to reviews, so thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Holet

customer_reviews.title: Love the color (purple)
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a large to extra large and after reading the reviews ordered a small/medium (smallest size offered) and it is still big. I am 5 ft tall and it is floor length. The sleeves are a bit long and pockets are between my hips and my knees. Love the color (purple), the quality, the feel, the warmth. It is like wearing a blanket for me and since I run COLD I am keeping it for the winter months. Would definitely be too warm for spring through early fall if you live in Florida. If it were sized right I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Senior Shutterbug

customer_reviews.title: This robe is so comfortable and well made - I just love it
customer_reviews.text: This robe is so comfortable and well made - I just love it! I am 5'7" and weigh 145 lbs. and the Small/Medium size fits me perfectly. I believe these are Unisex sizes and the Large would be way too big for me. I bought the navy blue and may also get the burgundy. The velour is soft and sumptuous and the double zipper works very well and glides easily. I like that the sleeves at the bottom are more narrow than some other robes I have had that always got in the way and got wet and caught on things when I was cooking. I am delighted with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Moon

customer_reviews.title: Cozy in this item
customer_reviews.text: This is soft, warm, and ez to throw on. It doesn’t just run big. It is huge. 2 of me could fit in here, but it’s cozy! I tried to post a photo that shows my zipper stuck in the fleece that lines it. I don’t think lining the zipper so closely was a good idea. Had to use scissors to trim it back- a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Large-extra large does not run big in my opinion as stated in other reviews. Back it goes.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews about it running large I ordered a Large-extra large which is the largest size I wear in some clothes. No way do I think it is sized right. It’s on the way back. Even if I ordered a size up it would probably be snug over a nightgown. The fabric and color of Jade is beautiful however.
customer_reviews.author: J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: but I LOVE it anyway
customer_reviews.text: I knew this was going to be large just by the reviews...but I LOVE it anyway. It is very good quality, soft and comfy. It is long...goes all the way to my feet, and I am 5'4". I don't trip on it, but if I were a little shorter that would definitely be a problem. I am about 145 lbs and it is large on me, so it is not made for someone that is small...and I got the small/medium. I am so glad I chose this size, if I would've went a size larger it would've been too large.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K. Root

customer_reviews.title: Plush and luxurious!
customer_reviews.text: So luxurious!!! Thick soft fleece, and the colors are so pretty. This is getting me through a cold Maine winter. Sleeves are long. Length is long (I am 5'11"). The top (shoulder area) is very broad and loose on me. But the hips fit true. Oh, and the 2 way zipper! That is classy, in my opinion. I am beyond overjoyed with this robe.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Pranckunas

customer_reviews.title: Love the robe--It is very cozy and very warm--The reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the robe--It is very cozy and very warm--The reviews about robe running large or correct--I usually wear a Large, X-large and I ordered the next size down which was the Small-Medium--Held my breath till it got here and it fit perfectly--With just enough room to spare without being to big--Look at the picture and it is a roomier fit not form fitting.
customer_reviews.author: R. S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Winter Robe
customer_reviews.text: I love this robe. The color is a deep purple and it feels like someone is rapping you in the softest blanket you could ever imagine. It's heavy and warm with great pockets and the zipper works perfectly. I've practically lived in it since I've gotten it. I'm thinking about buying another for when this one wears out. It's just that great a robe. I read the reviews and bought a size smaller than what I usually wear, and it fit perfectly. That's the only thing to consider when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: My robe arrived today and I love it! Usually order a 1x because I like a fuller fit. But, after reading all the reviews, I opted for a l/xl and it fits perfectly. I am tall and it is the perfect length. The color - blue - looks just like the picture and it is soft and comfortable. I think this is the perfect Christmas present from me to me! 😊🎄
customer_reviews.author: S. Glovna

customer_reviews.title: Del Rossa women’s robe
customer_reviews.text: I read several reviews that mentioned the ‘generously’ sized robe. I’m quite satisfied with the s/m. It is roomy and quite comfortable over my nightgowns. The color is pretty, the weight is light but nicely warm. I really like the length and zipper. I have a very old grungy robe that I refused to replace because of the zipper feature. This is a delightful replacement!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Thick, heavy, and warm.
customer_reviews.text: This robe is cut really large, and it's heavy. I'm a standard size 8 and thought the S-M would be fine, but it fits more like an L. Also, the weight of the extra fabric is noticeable. On the positive side, I'm not returning this robe because when the weather turns really cold, I'll be wearing a thick blanket with sleeves. This might be a good thing, or not.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hartley

customer_reviews.title: THE EPITOME OF WARMTH & LUSH!
customer_reviews.text: What a GREAT robe! Warmth beyond belief - soft & a sherpa lined interior all in the the blackest of black (is there any other color?) even the inside of the pockets. I take a size 4-6 & ordered the s/m, this robe is HUGE & I love it. At 5'2" it comes to the top of my feet - just perfect. The seams are nice & flat as is the easy to zip zipper. I'm one happy & warm gal who says if you want the warmest & most comfortable robe (IMHO), you won't go wrong ordering this one.
customer_reviews.author: It's just me

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate comfy winter robe
customer_reviews.text: I love my new robe. I got the purple fuschia plaid. I may never buy a belted robe again. The quality is good for the price. I love the colors and it is warm. The only thing I wish it were a little looser right at the knees where the zipper begins. I want to get matching tall fuzzy socks to complete my ultimate cozy home attire. I'm a busy 190lb 5'6" woman and after reading reviews ordered a small medium and it's just fine. Loose enough for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: DaNa LeWis GUy

customer_reviews.title: Plush, but big!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this robe, very plush & nice looking. Unfortunately, had to return it bc the size was way too big. Ordered a small for my mother who is 88 and tiny, but we probably could’ve fit 3 of her in the small bc it was so large! She really wanted a winter zipper robe (which are hard to find) & this would’ve been perfect had it not been for the size (otherwise would’ve given 5 stars). Not sure what their size base is, but it definitely runs very big.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not very generous in the circumference of the robe.
customer_reviews.text: In other words this robe is pretty skimpy width wise around the lower end of the garment. When I sit it pulls along the zipper bottom which begin to separate from the garment. I thought the size 1x which is my usual size would have worked well. Otherwise it is pretty and the fabric is warm.
customer_reviews.author: Karie

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: The robe is a lovely color and the fabric is soft and warm. Exactly what I was looking for. At 5'6" and 135 lb., the small/medium robe reached my ankles and and wrists which surprised me since most combination sizes run short. The cut of the robe is very generous. Definitely "loose." I almost thought it was too big. Can't say I'm looking forward to the weather that will require this robe, but it will be great to have ready.
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: Cozy, warm, ample
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to other reviews I was prepared to order DOWN. I’m normally L/XL and the S/M fit fine. I don’t see how a true small/medium would manage; they’d be swimming. It is very cozy and super warm. It’s soft and the zipper seems to be good quality. I suspect it won’t last for years but I do love it for now. I got the pale blue. Isotoner slippers (sold on Amazon) in sky blue match perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Light

customer_reviews.title: So warm, but not very attractive
customer_reviews.text: Is this going to make my husband want me as soon as he sees me? No. But it is the most comfy plushy let-me-lie-on-the-couch-and-do-nothing robe you can get. The zipper keeps heat in, but makes your body look like a sack. Mostly I feel like I look like an exhausted house wife in mine, but as a perpetually cold person, it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellebelle223

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: It run very large but I love this robe for Fall - Spring. It is super comfy and warm. I am only 5'2 so I have to cuff the sleeves once and the length is just above the floor! Keep saying that I will cut it and hem but who knows if I will every actually get time to do that. At least it's not dragging the ground!
customer_reviews.author: jabez71

customer_reviews.title: Relaxed fit is super sized.
customer_reviews.text: These robes are all super comfortable and love the big pockets. MAKE SURE you order the Slim Fit versus this RELAXED fit. The RELAXED fit is super large that 3 of me can fit in one. It is XXL. I'm going to keep it as it's perfect wear for pregnancy. PS. The zipper is 2 ways. Meaning you can zip it up and down from the bottom. So if you're too hot you can zip it up from the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Caty

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a xl, but ordered a small/medium because of the reviews. This robe is still huge!
customer_reviews.author: S moss

customer_reviews.title: OUCH!
customer_reviews.text: This is not an inexpensive robe; yet, it was made to zip up to the chin with a zipper that has sharp edges on the ends. If you want to unzip it a bit, the sharp edges dig into and scratch your chin and neck. I sew, so I am going to over-stitch the end of the zipper so it is smooth. I like everything else about the robe.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Spillios

product_meta.title: Alexander Del Rossa Women's Zip Up Fleece Robe, Warm Loose Sherpa Bathrobe
feature_bullets: RISK FREE GUARANTEE - We know that one of the biggest drawbacks to buying clothes online is the fact that you can't try the product in person - that is why we absorb that risk for you. Order this plush robe now and if you are not completely satisfied, you can return it for a full refund, no questions asked.

WARM AND PLUSH - This warm robe for women is made from plush 330 GSM coral fleece to keep you warm no matter how low the temperature drops. Enjoy the comfort of plush microfiber fleece every day as part of your morning and evening routine.
LARGE POCKETS - This plush robe features two large pockets that are big enough for your phone and warm enough for your hands.
FULL ZIP UP DESIGN - You never have to worry about your robe falling open because this garment features a full zipper for a custom fit

GIVE THE GIFT OF RELAXATION - A comfortable robe is a thoughtful way of telling her "You deserve to relax" - making it the perfect present for Christmas, Mother's Day or her birthday. Our robes are folded packaged neatly making them easy to wrap for a nice presentation.
